attributes.action: say no to China building or operating new nuclear power stations in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The UK government should take a longer term view and should build and operate the new nuclear power stations , using our own Engineers and labour.
We can then benefit from the profits not China and France.
Allowing China to design and build exports our Engineering jobs to a country with poor health and safety, poor quality and poor human rights. let alone
the safety issues and the safety of our country
